title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Automating Suricata rules for AWS network firewall (DEV206)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 为 AWS 网络防火墙自动化 Suricata 规则 (DEV206)
abstract: Writing and updating Suricata rules for AWS Network Firewall shouldn’t be the blocker to achieving your security goals. In this session, I’ll share how we built a lightweight pipeline that transforms raw inputs, like ports, protocols, domains, and IPs, into production-ready suricata rules using Amazon EventBridge, AWS Lambda, and Amazon S3. You’ll learn how we used built-in filtering and transformation to streamline rule generation and updates, reduce operational overhead, and make Suricata more accessible for security teams. This is a story of event-driven design and practical automation that brings powerful network controls into reality.
abstract_cn: 编写和更新 AWS Network Firewall 的 Suricata 规则不应成为实现安全目标的障碍。在本次会议中,我将分享我们如何构建一个轻量级管道,使用 Amazon EventBridge、AWS Lambda 和 Amazon S3 将端口、协议、域名和 IP 等原始输入转换为生产就绪的 Suricata 规则。您将了解我们如何使用内置的过滤和转换功能来简化规则生成和更新、减少运营开销,并使安全团队更容易使用 Suricata。这是一个关于事件驱动设计和实用自动化的故事,将强大的网络控制变为现实。
